known_issues: Partners list incorrectly shows more than 5 partners; should be capped at 5

existing_features.title: In the Partners component, ensure the static partners data array contains exactly 5 partner entries. Remove any partner entries beyond the 5th so that no more than 5 partner cards are ever rendered on the page.

If the backend partner data (fetched via useGetPartners) returns more than 5 partners, cap the rendered list to the first 5 entries on the frontend so the UI never shows more than 5 partners regardless of backend data.

new_feature_requests.summary: Limit partners to exactly 5; remove any extra partner entries beyond 5
